commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all deployed objects
commonAnnotations.title: commonAnnotations

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all deployed objects
commonLabels.title: commonLabels

extraDeploy.description: Array of extra objects to deploy with the release
extraDeploy.title: extraDeploy

annotations.description: Additional annotations provided to the Gateway resource
annotations.title: annotations

exportTo.description: Optional: Control which namespaces can access this DestinationRule
exportTo.title: exportTo

subsets.description: Optional: Define subsets for versioned routing (e.g., by labels)
subsets.title: subsets

trafficPolicy.description: additionalProperties: true @schema Optional: Apply a mesh-wide traffic policy
trafficPolicy.title: trafficPolicy

workloadSelector.description: additionalProperties: true @schema Optional: Apply only to specific workloads (via selector labels)
workloadSelector.title: workloadSelector

gatewayClassName.description: Gateway class that determines the backend used Currently supported values: "kgateway", "istio", or "gke-l7-regional-external-managed"
gatewayClassName.title: gatewayClassName

gatewayParameters.description: Special parameters applied to kGateway via GatewayParameters resource

accessLogging.description: For istio to include access logging or not
accessLogging.title: accessLogging

gatewayParameters.title: gatewayParameters

labels.description: Additional labels provided to the Gateway resource
labels.title: labels

listeners.description: Set of listeners exposed via the Gateway, also propagated to the Ingress if enabled

allowedRoutes.description: AllowedRoutes defines the types of routes that MAY be attached to a Listener and the trusted namespaces where those Route resources MAY be present.

name.description: Name is the name of the Listener. This name MUST be unique within a Gateway.

port.description: Port is the network port. Multiple listeners may use the same port (subject to compatibility rules).

protocol.description: Protocol specifies the network protocol this listener expects to receive.

tls.description: TLS configuration for the Listener. Required when protocol is HTTPS or TLS.

certificateRefs.description: References to Kubernetes Secrets containing TLS certificates.

name.description: Name of the Secret containing the TLS certificate.

namespace.description: Namespace of the Secret. If omitted, defaults to the Gateway's namespace.

hostname.description: Hostname to match for TLS SNI. Required for TLS termination.

mode.description: TLS mode. Typically "Terminate" for TLS termination at the gateway.

listeners.title: listeners

service.description: type: object additionalProperties: false required: [type] properties:   type:     type: string     description: >       Gateway's service type. Ingress is only available if the service type       is set to LoadBalancer. Accepted values: ["LoadBalancer","ClusterIP","NodePort"].     enum: [LoadBalancer, ClusterIP, NodePort]     default: ClusterIP   ports:     type: array     description: >       Optional. List of service ports. If provided, each item must include "port".     items:       type: object       additionalProperties: true       required: [port]       properties:         port:           description: >             Port is the network port. Multiple listeners may use the same port             (subject to compatibility rules).           type: integer           minimum: 1           maximum: 65535         nodePort:           type: integer           minimum: 30000           maximum: 32767   loadBalancerClass:     type: string     description: >       Optional. LoadBalancerClass is the class of the load balancer to use.       Ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/services-networking/service/#load-balancer-class @schema

loadBalancerClass.description: Optional. LoadBalancerClass is the class of the load balancer to use. Ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/services-networking/service/#load-balancer-class

ports.description: Optional. List of service ports. If provided, each item must include "port".

port.description: Port is the network port. Multiple listeners may use the same port (subject to compatibility rules).

type.description: Gateway's service type. Ingress is only available if the service type is set to LoadBalancer. Accepted values: ["LoadBalancer","ClusterIP","NodePort"].

service.title: service

global.description: Global values are values that can be accessed from any chart or subchart by exactly the same name.
global.title: global

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the Ingress resource
annotations.title: annotations

enabled.description: Deploy Ingress (service type must also be ClusterIP)
enabled.title: enabled

extraHosts.description: List of additional hostnames to be covered with this ingress record (e.g. a CNAME) <!-- E.g. extraHosts:   - name: llm-d.env.example.com     path: / (Optional)     pathType: Prefix (Optional)     port: 7007 (Optional) -->
extraHosts.title: extraHosts

extraTls.description:
The TLS configuration for additional hostnames to be covered with this ingress record.
Ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/services-networking/ingress/#tls
extraTls.title: extraTls

host.description: Hostname to be used to expose the ClusterIP service to the inferencing gateway
host.title: host

ingressClassName.description: Name of the IngressClass cluster resource which defines which controller will implement the resource (e.g nginx)
ingressClassName.title: ingressClassName

path.description: Path to be used to expose the full route to access the inferencing gateway
path.title: path

enabled.description: Enable TLS configuration for the host defined at `ingress.host` parameter
enabled.title: enabled

secretName.description: The name to which the TLS Secret will be called
secretName.title: secretName
